promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a dynamic mythical wolf steel-type wearing a white crown. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or steel. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crownwolf, a dynamic mythical wolf steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: shift-gear. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word wolf or steel or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, wolf-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Crownwolf dwells in mountainous regions, unafraid. Its Shift-Gear ability lets it adapt powerfully to any situation.
